pageDescription: Understand class stories, companions, choices, and planet-by-planet progression.

whatAre.title: What are Class Stories?
whatAre.text1: Each class in SWTOR has a <hl>unique story</hl> divided into 3 acts, with exclusive characters, villains, and plot twists.
whatAre.text2: Class stories are the heart of the game — experienced players recommend playing at least one from each faction.
whatAre.text3: There are <hl>8 class stories</hl>: 4 Empire and 4 Republic.

progression.title: Planet-by-Planet Progression
progression.text1: Your class story advances as you visit new planets. Each planet has a specific part of the storyline.
progression.text2: Planets follow a recommended level order. Check the <hl>Story Arc</hl> to see the complete path.

companions.title: Companions
companions.text1: During your story, you'll recruit <hl>Companions</hl> — characters who fight alongside you and interact with the storyline.
companions.text2: Each class has unique companions with distinct personalities and abilities.
companions.text3: Companions can serve as <hl>DPS, Tank, or Healer</hl>, regardless of who they are.

choices.title: Light / Dark Choices
choices.text1: Your choices during conversations affect your <hl>Light Side</hl> or <hl>Dark Side</hl> points.
choices.text2: Some choices can alter the course of your story, including the fate of companions and NPCs.
choices.text3: Don't worry about "getting it wrong" — all choices are valid and part of the experience.
